pnp:ListInstance.Title: Employee onboarding
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Manage your new employee's onboarding process from day 1. Share resources and contacts, and get your new hire up-to-speed quickly.

View.Name: {AF9C3CF9-FA6C-4CC1-88F0-FDF47EB6D7A0}
View.DisplayName: Group work by completed by date
View.Url: {site}/Lists/Employee onboarding/Group work by completed by date.aspx

Field.Description: Due date by when work should be completed
Field.Name: Completeby
Field.Title: Complete by

Field.Description: Mark as yes, if work is completed
Field.Name: Complete
Field.Title: Complete

Field.Description: Date on which work was completed
Field.Name: Completedon
Field.Title: Completed on

Field.Description: Point of contact to help with the work item
Field.Name: Mentor
Field.Title: Mentor

Field.Description: Helpful link to support the work
Field.Name: Relevantlink
Field.Title: Relevant Link

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Form Templates
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This library contains administrator-approved form templates that were activated to this site collection.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Style Library
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use the style library to store style sheets, such as CSS or XSL files. The style sheets in this gallery can be used by this site or any of its subsites.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Welcome to Nexi Denmark

You're finally here! And you're probably wondering what to do next. Start by selecting 'Get started' below to view first-day tasks. The rest of the site is yours to explore, get to know your new team, and for us to get to know you.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
JUMP START ONBOARDING

Get set-up for success [Sample content]

Learn more about where to find resources, how to set up accounts, and where to go for questions and support.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
CONTOSO SALES

Our disciplines [Sample content]

Each discipline has their own strength and focus, but we all collaborate as one team. To learn more about how we work together, visit how we work.
